code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{Card,Container,Row,Col,Spinner}from"react-bootstrap";import"./HealthTips.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HealthTips=()=>{const[tips,setTips]=useState([]);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{fetch("${process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL}/healthtips").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>{setTips(data);setLoading(false);});},[]);if(loading)return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"text-center py-5",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spinner,{animation:"border",variant:"primary"})});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:" pt-navbar",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Health Tips & Guide"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Row,{children:tips.map((tip,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Col,{md:6,lg:4,className:"mb-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card,{className:"healthtip-card h-100",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Card.Body,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Title,{children:tip.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Text,{children:tip.content})]}),tip.source&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Card.Footer,{className:"text-muted text-end",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:tip.source,target:"_blank",rel:"noopener noreferrer",children:"Read more"})})]})},index))})]});};export default HealthTips;
